803170.name: San Francisco [KSFO] airport for Tower!3D Pro
803170.description:
Tower!3D Pro - KSFO airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge. With it's four runways this airport will give you a unique experience requiring some precise controlling skills.

The Airport located 13 miles (21 km) southeast of downtown San Francisco, on 5207 acres (8.1 sq mi; 20.3 sq km) and
it is accessible to the San Francisco Bay communities by multiple highways and the Bay Area Rapid Transit (B.A.R.T) rail system.
The airport complex now consists of four terminals with seven concourses and four crossing runways.

In 2010 KSFO was ranked 23rd in the world for having almost 40,000,000 passenger pass through the facility.
Total traffic movements in 2009, 24th ranked in the world, were 379,751; an average of just over 1000 aircraft
movements each day. Local time is -8 hours to UTC
803170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
